input.sentences: the graveyard has many old headstones .
there is also a vast amount of modern ones .
sometimes you will find a family headstone .
there are also headstones for a husband and wife .
you can go online to research the people of any headstone that looks interesting to you .
output.sentences: There are many different kinds of headstones in a graveyard.
Some are modern and feature a large amount of text.
Others are dedicated to entire families.
One headstone may be shared by a husband and wife buried together.
More about the lives of the individuals in this graveyard can be learned by doing research online.
